title: Metformin and T2D
text: Metformin is first-line in T2D per guidelines; consider contraindications such as eGFR thresholds and monitor B12 over long-term use.

title: Hypertension stages
text: Stage 1 hypertension management includes lifestyle measures; pharmacotherapy may include thiazide diuretics, ACE inhibitors, ARBs or calcium channel blockers depending on comorbidities.
